statements: DELETE FROM literature_reviews WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_id = 1 AND author_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM reviews_comments WHERE commenter = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM research_collaborators WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND institution = 'University of Science'
DELETE FROM AccessLog WHERE researcher_id = 1001 AND action = 'view';
DELETE FROM Researcher WHERE institution = 'University of Science';
DELETE FROM collaborations WHERE researcher_id_1 = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' OR researcher_id_2 = '876e4599-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174888';
